Flub.Name: Whorls
Flub.Description: The number of whorls to add to the terrain.

Flub.Name: Power
Flub.Description: The strength of the distortion applied with each whorl.

Flub.Name: Spin
Flub.Description: Whorls appear as round, independent formations.

Flub.Name: Stretch
Flub.Description: Whorls appear as stretched, interconnected formations.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
